QuestData.Title: Up a Tree
QuestData.Description: Hold still a second, I'm going to bring your main buzzsaw controls online.$B$BNight elven snipers from Talrendis have been hiding in the trees, taking potshots at my workers. I want you to take care of those snipers... by first taking care of those trees. Look for Azshara saplings east of the main gates. Your shredder will know what to do. Chop to it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the shredder's buzzsaw to cut down Azshara Saplings, and kill 9 Talrendis Snipers as they emerge.
QuestData.RewardText: Great work, $n! That's how we took care of business back on Kezan.
